title: Nujabes - An Introduction: The Best Of (2013)
description:
Nujabes is a once-in-a-lifetime talent who was taken from us far too early. His music is truly divine. Rest In Peace.

IÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve created this one-disc, 80 minute compilation, as an introduction for Hip-Hop heads who are not yet familiar with Nujabes incredible discography. Attempting to show off the diversity of his work, I have included songs from each of his three LPs (Metaphorical Music, Modal Soul and Spiritual State), both of his Hydeout Productions compilations, and his work on the Samurai Champloo soundtracks; as well as evenly dividing the tracks between vocal and instrumental.

My hope is that whoever hears this will be inspired to dig deeply into the rest of his discography. I hope you enjoy Nujabes music as much I do.

01. Feather feat. Cise Starr & Akin (CYNE)
02. Voice of Autumn
03. Highs 2 Lows feat. Cise Starr
04. Mystline
05. Blessing It feat. Substantial & Pase Rock
06. Sky Is Falling feat C.L Smooth
07. Reflection Eternal
08. Beat Laments The World
09. Luv (Sic) feat. Shing02
10. Aruarian Dance
11. Lady Brown feat. Cise Starr
12. Waltz For Life Will Born feat. Uyama Hiroto
13. Waiting For The Clouds feat. Substantial
14. Still Talking To You
15. Sky is Tumbling feat. Cise Starr
16. Another Reflection
17. Latitude (Remix) feat. Five Deez
18. Windspeaks feat. Uyama Hiroto
19. Luv (Sic) Part 2 feat. Shing02
20. The Final View
